name: EKKO-Platform
description: Ekko Platform is a newly developed decentralized exchange (DEX) designed to compete directly with Bullx and Photon. Built for both novice and experienced traders, Ekko sets itself apart by integrating powerful toolsâ€”completely free of charge. Our platform features sniper bots for executing trades at lightning speed, copy trading to follow top-performing traders effortlessly, and a rug tracker to help users identify potential scams before they invest. With a focus on security, efficiency, and innovation, Ekko aims to redefine the DEX experience and provide traders with the edge they need in the fast-paced world of decentralized finance (DeFi).
